name: Petzl Laser Speed Light Ice Screw
description: Shave weight, move fast. The tubes of these screws are aluminum with steel drilling tips. The teeth are designed to bite in about a quarter turn, so you can get your screws started rapidly. Integrated cranks apply efficient leverage to wind them in with one hand even at awkward angles. A smallish hanger is easier to place in sculpted ice, but big enough to grip with gloves or cold fingers.Ultralight anodized aluminum tubes with stainless steel drilling tips. Hangers are aluminum.Colour-coded cranking handles make identification easier.Swivelling crank on the hanger allows fast placement and removal.Sharpening reserve on the teeth helps with filing.
